meanings.definition: A person or thing that spills.
meanings.sent1: The clumsy spillers knocked over the milk.
meanings.sent2: The children are the spillers of toys in the playroom.
meanings.sent3: The spillers of secrets always have loose lips.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was a spillers of joy in the quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The spillers of paint left colorful trails behind them.

meanings.definition: A company or individual that spills oil or other hazardous substances.
meanings.sent1: The spillers caused an environmental disaster with their negligence.
meanings.sent2: The spillers of chemicals were fined for polluting the river.
meanings.sent3: The spillers of oil had to clean up their mess in the ocean.
meanings.sent4: The spillers of toxins endangered the wildlife in the area.
meanings.sent5: The spillers of pollutants faced legal consequences for their actions.

meanings.definition: A type of plant that spills over the edge of a container or hanging basket.
meanings.sent1: The spillers of ivy added a beautiful touch to the garden.
meanings.sent2: The spillers of flowers cascaded down the sides of the pot.
meanings.sent3: The spillers of vines created a lovely curtain effect.
meanings.sent4: The spillers of greenery brought life to the balcony.
meanings.sent5: The spillers of foliage added a touch of nature to the room.
